com.sb.elsinore

Class LaunchControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sb.elsinore.LaunchControl

  • public final class LaunchControl
extends java.lang.Object
    LaunchControl is the core class of Elsinore. It reads the config file, determining whether to run setup or not It launches the threads for the PIDs, Temperature, and Mash It write the config file on shutdown. It sets up the OWFS connection
    Author:
    doug
